DOC.brief_summary: A Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses MT-8554 Female Subjects Experiencing Vasomotor Symptoms
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Multiple Doses MT-8554 Female Subjects Experiencing Vasomotor Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Subjects must meet one follow criterion : Woman age ≥18 year histologically proven nonmetastatic breast cancer ( Stages I , II III ) without evidence disease / Woman age ≥40 year postmenopausal / Woman age ≥40 year perimenopausal Subjects ≥7 Vasomotor Symptoms per day average A body weight ≥45 kg Participation three clinical study involve administration unlicensed Investigational Medicinal Product previous year , study within 12 week Clinically significant endocrine , thyroid , hepatic , respiratory , gastrointestinal , renal , cardiovascular disease , history significant psychiatric/psychotic illness disorder Clinically relevant abnormal medical history , physical finding laboratory value
